hero.badge: Global remote job opportunities for professionals
hero.description: Unlock your potential with flexible and rewarding remote jobs. Connect with legitimate, high-quality remote opportunities across multiple industries and achieve the perfect work-life balance.

showcase.title: Remote Work Hub
showcase.subtitle: Work from anywhere in the world

whyChoose.description: Discover the life-changing benefits of working remotely

benefits.title: Flexibility
benefits.description: Work when and where you want with complete control over your schedule.

benefits.title: Access to Global Markets
benefits.description: Find opportunities from companies around the world without relocating.

benefits.title: Cost Savings
benefits.description: Save money on commuting, relocation, and daily work expenses.

benefits.title: Work-Life Balance
benefits.description: Create better harmony between your professional and personal life.

benefits.title: Skill Enhancement
benefits.description: Gain exposure to international projects and advanced remote work tools.

benefits.title: Diverse Network
benefits.description: Build connections with professionals from different cultures worldwide.

whatWeOffer.description: Comprehensive solutions for your remote work journey

services.title: Curated Remote Job Listings
services.description: We handpick and verify opportunities in sectors such as IT, digital marketing, content writing, graphic design, customer support, virtual assistance, and more

services.title: Freelance & Full-Time Remote Roles
services.description: Whether you're looking for project-based freelance gigs or full-time roles, we have options to suit different preferences

services.title: Personalized Job Matching
services.description: Our experts help match your skills, experience, and career goals with the right companies

services.title: Application Support
services.description: From resume optimization for remote roles to interview preparation, we support you throughout the hiring process

services.title: Training for Remote Work Skills
services.description: Gain proficiency in remote collaboration tools, communication etiquette, and time management to thrive in virtual workspaces

whoShould.description: Remote work opens doors for professionals at every stage of their career

audience.title: Fresh Graduates
audience.description: Ready to launch their careers with flexible remote opportunities

audience.title: Freelancers
audience.description: Looking to expand their client base globally

audience.title: Currency Earners
audience.description: Anyone wishing to earn in foreign currencies without leaving their country

audience.title: Remote Explorers
audience.description: People who want complete location freedom while working

howToStart.description: Your journey to remote work success in 4 simple steps

steps.title: Register with JobsAdmire
steps.description: Create your profile showcasing your skills and experience

steps.title: Browse & Apply
steps.description: Explore our curated remote jobs and apply for roles that match your profile

steps.title: Prepare & Interview
steps.description: Benefit from our application and interview coaching to increase your chances

steps.title: Secure Your Remote Job
steps.description: Land a remote role and enjoy the freedom of working from anywhere
